title: News24.com | Panic buying: 'I didn't want to take things lightly', says Gauteng shopper as lockdown looms
description: While the country prepares to go into lockdown for 21 days, shopping centres and cash and carry markets in Johannesburg are packed to capacity, with shoppers queuing from as early as 07:00.
content:
While the country prepares to go into lockdown for 21 days, shopping centres and cash and carry markets in Johannesburg were packed to capacity on Tuesday, with shoppers queuing from as early as 07:00.
The sudden buying came just hours after President Cyril … [+5117 chars]
